name: BEHIND (AlejandroBorreguero)
description:
Behind is a runner game in which you control a group of characters. You have to reach the goal using only one button to switch between characters to avoid trap or being detected.

We are imporving the game to add characters and art. In a future, we want to recreate the sensation of been escaping from a dangerous place, and the challenges is to think about who are you going to save.

Developed with Unity 2018.
